title: Lunar Wraith Caitlyn
body: This skin won't be going on sale correct?

replies.body:
She won't be, no. 

We changed how pricing worked in 2016, one of the big changes being that 1350 RP skins will no longer be going on sale at release. If you're curious about the other changes, you can [check out this article](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts) which explains  everything else. ^-^ TL;DR the big win is more sales more often.
